title: Garden Tubs, Large Closets, Wood Floors, Alarms! $500 OFF RENT!
posting_body: Located in the prestigious Las Colinas area of Irving Texas, is the perfect setting for recreation and relaxation in style.
Its ideal location places you within close proximity to fabulous shopping and dining at MacArthur Park Shopping Center, Grapevine Mills Mall and The Galleria.
We also provides easy access to nearby freeways and Downtown Dallas.
Choose from one of our ten distinctive one, two or three bedroom floor plans, which have been meticulously crafted to accommodate any individual's lifestyle.
Each apartment home offers a fully equipped kitchen, generous closet space, elegant bathrooms with garden tubs and so much more.

Take advantage of our spectacular recreational amenities including a sparkling pool, three putting greens, free on-site ATM, complimentary gourmet coffee daily, a state-of-the-art fitness center, free bike rentals and a serene jogging trail.
Please Call Desiree with DASH Apartment Locator
